entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 8:48 PM CST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. High minus 18.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning in the morning. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 34 in the morning and minus 27 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 8:48 PM CST Sunday 25 December 2022
